title: 10/2/17 - Don't Immediately Blame the President (John Di Domenico &  Peter Shankman  join the program)
description:
Shooting during a Jason Aldean concert... NFL still taking a knee... Knowing what it means to politicize an issue... Reports say he took his own life... Politicians being too political after this shooting...Trump to speak to the public about the shooting... John Di Domenico gives us insight on Las Vegas... Explaining the layout of the concert... How was it possible to start something like this? ... ISIS claims responsibility for the shooting... ISIS now radicalizing our seniors? …  FBI source says Stephen Paddock had radical leanings when it came to political views… take with a grain of salt... Hillary Clinton passes blame to the NRA.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
